api.spriteless

Class AbstractTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.TextComponent
        • java.awt.TextArea
          • api.spriteless.AbstractTimer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpritelessElement, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

extends java.awt.TextArea
implements SpritelessElement
